short_description: Deep Hydration with 2% Hyaluronic Acid: Formulated with a potent 2% concentration, Hyaluronic Acid delivers intense moisture to dry and dehydrated skin. It helps improve elasticity and promotes a supple, plump complexion after just one use.

Clean Skincare Made in New Zealand: Proudly crafted with non-animal-derived ingredients, this sheet mask is free from parabens, phthalates, and cruelty. Made in New Zealand, it reflects a commitment to quality and conscious beauty.

Bamboo Fiber Sheet for Seamless Absorption: Designed to contour your face with precision, the bamboo fiber sheet allows optimal delivery of active ingredients. Lightweight, breathable, and biodegradable, it’s as gentle on the planet as it is on your skin.

name: Mediheal Best Korean Hyaluronate Watermide Essential Face Mask - Hydrating and Moisturizing Sheet Masks With Hyalu Active 3x For All Skin Types (10 Count)
short_description: HYALU ACTIVE 3X – A blend of high, medium, and low molecular weight hyaluronic acids delivers multi-layer hydration, locking in moisture from the surface to deep within the skin.
Powered by HYDRODEEPER – MEDIHEAL’s signature moisturizing complex helps replenish and retain moisture, leaving your skin feeling fresh, supple, and hydrated.

BIODEGRADABLE SHEET - This VEGAN certified, eco-friendly sheet is silky soft and firmly hugs skin for optimal absorption of our powerful essence. Enhanced mask shape comfortably fits all face shapes. Tested and safe for sensitive skin.

FSC CERTIFIED + SOY INK PRINTED CARTONS - MEDIHEAL uses sustainable packaging certified to meet the environmental and social standards for FSC (Forest Stewardship Council) and print with eco-friendly soy-based ink.

HOW TO USE: 1. After cleansing and toning, apply mask. 2. Pull upward to fit the mask tightly to face, adjusting to fit around eyes, nose and mouth. 3. Relax for 10 - 20 minutes. 4. Remove and discard the mask. Lightly tap remaining essence to help it absorb into skin.

name: Mary&May Hyaluronic Panthenol Hydra Mask (30 Sheets) – Daily Pull-Out Box with 6 Types HA, Hydrating & Soothing Korean Sheet Mask for Dry Dehydrated Skin, Glass Skin Prep
short_description: 30-DAY PULL-OUT BOX WITH MINI TWEEZERS – ULTIMATE HYGIENE FOR DAILY HYDRATION: Say goodbye to messy, unsanitary masking. Unlike jars that require finger-dipping or individual packets that create waste, our innovative pull-out design lets you grab one fresh sheet daily with the built-in mini tweezers—completely touch-free. The tight-seal lid keeps all 30 masks saturated with essence from the first day to the last. Building a "1-Day-1-Mask" hydration habit has never been this easy or hygienic.

6 TYPES OF HYALURONIC ACID – MORE HA VARIETY THAN LEADING BRANDS: Not all hydration is created equal. While most masks use just 1-2 types of HA, we formulated with 6 different molecular weights of hyaluronic acid. This multi-layer approach delivers moisture to every level of the skin—from surface hydration that you can feel immediately, to deep nourishment that lasts throughout the day. The result? Plump, bouncy, thoroughly quenched skin that actually stays hydrated.

PANTHENOL (PRO-VITAMIN B5) + ALLANTOIN – SOOTHING CARE FOR SENSITIVE SKIN: Hydration meets comfort. Panthenol is renowned for its ability to retain moisture and support the skin barrier, while allantoin calms visible redness and soothes irritation. Together, they transform dry, tight, uncomfortable skin into a soft, smooth, and resilient complexion. If your skin feels reactive, stressed, or easily irritated, this gentle yet effective formula was made for you.

10-MINUTE MAKEUP PREP – THE SECRET TO "GLASS SKIN" MAKEUP: This isn't just skincare—it's your makeup's best friend. The lightweight, water-based essence absorbs quickly without any sticky or greasy residue. Use it for just 10 minutes before applying makeup to smooth skin texture, minimize the look of pores, and create the perfect canvas. Your foundation will glide on seamlessly and stay fresh all day without caking, creasing, or flaking. The K-beauty "glass skin" look starts here.

VEGAN & CRUELTY-FREE – CLEAN DAILY CARE YOU CAN TRUST: Good ingredients, good conscience. Our formula is vegan, cruelty-free, and free from parabens and alcohol. Dermatologically tested for daily use on all skin types. Use morning or night—after cleansing, apply for 10-15 minutes, then pat remaining essence gently into skin. (Note: Contains fragrance; patch test recommended if you have extra-sensitive skin.)
